title: CSTF SERVICES
intro: Custom Steel Trusses & Frames - CSTF has completed more than 500 projects in Asia and Australia - With over 25 years of combined experience, we have the knowledge to serve you.

services.title: DESIGN
services.description: Provide us with architectural plans and we will design the structural and fabrication plans that suit your unique project.

services.title: FABRICATION
services.description: Using the advanced FRAMECAD fabrication production line and software suite, we can make sure that every steel frame component will fit together perfectly.

services.title: PROJECT MANAGEMENT
services.description: Customer service is in the core of our business, our project management team will oversee every project from the design stage till completion and maintain adequate communication with our client to ensure to smooth project delivery.

services.title: INSTALLATION AND CERTIFICATION
services.description: Installation is part of our comprehensive service which will save your money and time looking for a third party installer. Engineer inspection and certification are included as part of installation service. You can have the peace of mind knowing your house is built to Australian Standard.
